solution_line_template: First find the number of tablespoons in a full cup: {tablespoons_per_half_cup} tablespoons/half-cup * {half_cups_per_cup} half-cups/cup = <<{tablespoons_per_half_cup}*{half_cups_per_cup}={tablespoons_per_cup}>>{tablespoons_per_cup} tablespoons

Then find the total number of teaspoons in a cup: {tablespoons_per_cup} tablespoons/cup * {teaspoons_per_tablespoon} teaspoons/tablespoon = <<{tablespoons_per_cup}*{teaspoons_per_tablespoon}={teaspoons_per_cup}>>{teaspoons_per_cup} teaspoons

Then find the number of grains of rice per teaspoon: {grains_per_cup} grains / {teaspoons_per_cup} teaspoons = <<{grains_per_cup}/{teaspoons_per_cup}={grains_per_teaspoon}>>{grains_per_teaspoon} grains/teaspoon
